C parsing


tools to parse C language


CElementType

type: C enum
description: types of C code elements
C_COMMENT
C_PREPROCESSOR_IFDEF
C_PREPROCESSOR_IFNDEF
C_PREPROCESSOR_IF
C_PREPROCESSOR_ELSE
C_PREPROCESSOR_ELIF
C_PREPROCESSOR_ENDIF
C_PREPROCESSOR_PRAGMA
C_PREPROCESSOR_INCLUDE
C_PREPROCESSOR_ERROR
C_PREPROCESSOR_UNDEF
C_PREPROCESSOR_DEFINE
C_INSTRUCTION
C_UNDEFINED
C_FUNCTION
C_FUNCTION_POINTER
C_TYPEDEF
C_ENUM
C_STRUCT
C_UNION
C_ELEMENT_COUNT

CElement

typedef struct {
  CElementType type;
  uint         line_start;
  uint         line_end;
  cstr         content;
  cstr         comment;
} CElement;
type: C struct
description: A C code element, with code content (and comment if applicable), along with line information

util_parse_c_file

bool util_parse_c_file(const char *file, CElement **elements);
type: C function
description: parse file and append CElement to dbuffer

util_get_c_name

bstr util_get_c_name(CElement *element);
type: C function
description: returns an identifier for C elements (define, function, typedef, enum, struct, union)

util_delete_c_elements

void util_delete_c_elements(CElement **elements);
type: C function
description: delete dbuffer c elements
